findings.message:
PromissoryToken.approveWithdraw has external calls inside a loop:
	- ! withdrawals[_withdrawalID].destination[i].send(amountPerAddr) (PromissoryToken_2.sol#303-308)
findings.name: calls-loop

findings.message:
PromissoryToken.promissoryUnits should be constant (PromissoryToken_2.sol#47-48)
PromissoryToken.redeemedTokens should be constant (PromissoryToken_2.sol#51)
findings.name: constable-states
